0.text: Bug 31804  setParent() is not called on nested tags in a tag file (.tagx).

2.text: Suppose I have a tag file (.tagx to be precise).

3.text: I have some custom tags of mine  included in that tag file.

4.text: If I override setParent() in such a custom tag, then  I see, that it's invoked with "null" parameter.

5.text: Custom tag is a "Classic" tag  (extends TagSupport).

6.text: Simplified example: This tag file is called "submit.tagx"  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <jsp:root xmlns:jsp="http://java.sun.com/JSP/Page" xmlns:custom="http://my.com/ tags-html" version="2.0" >      <jsp:directive.tag body-content="empty"/>     <jsp:directive.attribute name="action" required="true" rtexprvalue="true"/>     <jsp:directive.attribute name="label" required="true" rtexprvalue="true"/>      <custom:submit action="${action}" label="${label}" name="submitButton" />  </jsp:root>  In debug output from setParent(Tag) of custom:submit I see, that it's called  with "null" value.

7.text: If, instead of custom:submit, I put there another custom tag, which follows  SimpleTagSupport model, then setParent(JspTag) is not called at all!!!

8.text: I would expect a reference to something, representing translated class of Tag  File (submit.tagx) is passed.

9.text: As the result, tag nesting tree is broken.

10.text: I need to access Struts html:form tag, which is the embracing tag from my inner  <custom:submit> tag to obtain form name, but this is not possible.

11.text: <nested:form action="/Action">    <ctrl:submit action="save" label="Save"/> </nested:form>  (where ctrl:submit is submit.tagx)
